column2: 1. To what extent did you lose track of time? (1-5)
column3: 2. To what extent were you interested in seeing how the game events would progress? (1-5)
column4: 3. To what extent did you feel that the glove control was easy to pick up? (1-5)
column5: 4. To what extent did you feel as though you were separated from your real-world environment? (1-5)
column6: 5. To what extent did you feel motivated while playing? (1-5)
column7: 6. What motivated you the most in the game?
column8: 7. At any point did you find yourself become so involved that you were unaware you were even using controls? (1-5)
column9: 8. To what extent did you feel that the haptic feedback added a sense of reality to the game? (1-5)
column10: 9. Were you in suspense about whether or not you would win or lose the game? (1-5)
column11: 10. To what extent did you feel that the haptic feedback added a sense of enjoyment to the game? (1-5)
column12: 11. At any point did you find yourself become so involved that you were unaware you were wearing gloves? (1-5)
column13: 12. To what extent did you feel you were focused on the game? (1-5)
